item.title: Computer Network Review
item.description:
计算机网络

课程概述

参考教材

  • James F. Kurose, Keith W. Ross. 计算机网络-自顶向下方法(7th)

  • William Stallings. 数据与计算机通信(10th)

课程考核

  • 分组实践，课程报告 (30%)

  • 课后作业(30%)

  • 期末考试(40%)

nju2019autumn@163.com

课程内容

  • 端网络

    • 前端网络：客户端

    • 后端网络：服务端

  • 骨干网

item.title: 问题求解2019Spring
item.description: 问题求解 2019Spring 4.1线性规划 In linear programming, we do not allow strict inequalities. minimization linear program and maximization program The simplex algorithm does not run in polynomial time in the worst case, but it is fairly efficient and widely used in practice. item.title: Summary of definitions and theorems in graph theory
item.description: Summary of definitions and theorems in graph theory Introduction 1.1 Graphs and Graph Models A Graph G consists of a finite nonempty set $V$ of objects called vertices and a set $E$ of 2-element subsets of $V$ called edges. The ses $V$ and $E$ are the vertex set and edge set of $G$, respectively. Write $G=(V,E)$. Two graphs $G$ and $H$ are equal if $V(G)=V(H)$ and $E(G)=E(H)$, in which case

item.title: 数学之美笔记
item.description: 数学之美笔记 一、统计语言模型 利用数学犯法来解决自然语言处理问题，而非传统的语法分析。基于概率的模型 P(S)=P(w1)P(w2|w1)P(w3|w1&w2)…P(wn|w1&w2…&wn-1) 利用马尔可夫假设，可以简化为： P(S)=P(w1)P(w2|w1)P(w3|w2)…P(wi|wi-1) 二、谈谈
